Note: Signed "Dugas." Date based on the date of the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign. The text gives a list of what the Liberty bonds have been able to build in just France alone. People are asked to do their duty as Americans by purchasing bonds in the Fourth Liberty Loan. The list is within a black border with small stars in it.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: In France alone your Liberty Bonds have built
